alert.note: Alert for Fresno; Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 1:28PM PDT until August 21 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Merced County in central California... West central Fresno County in central California... * Until 200 PM PDT. * At 126 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of South Dos Palos, or 33 miles south of Merced, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... South Dos Palos and Dos Palos. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Rotation has been identified in this storm. This thunderstorm is capable of producing all types of severe weather including large or accumulating hail, destructive straight line winds and tornadoes. Move quickly to a safe shelter such as an interior room, a bathroom, closet or basement.
